text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Acer Aspire 7 17.3" IPS FHD 60 Htz  GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM 8th Gen Intel 6-core i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop A717-72G-700J - ONLY @ NEWEGG is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Aspire 7 17.3" IPS FHD 60 Htz  GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM 8th Gen Intel 6-core i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop A717-72G-700J - ONLY @ NEWEGG!
